page.title: 11Everydaylife,The Lenches
page.content: There are few local amenities in this area. There is only a single bus service, three days a week, from the village of Inkberrow to Evesham, passing through Church Lench. Cars are essential so a good neighbour policy helps non-drivers and the elderly. The village shop, the only one in the Lenches, acts as agent for occasional day trips run by a private bus company _ also for other services i.e.dry cleaners.It is also the Post Office. There is a mobile greengrocery van run by a local grower,that serves the area weekly.This man also hires out a pony and trap that is very popular for weddings. A fish and chip van toursthe area one day a week. The mobile library van from Evesham visits fortnightly and the doctor holds a surgery every Friday.
